entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: plaintext_spring, single_query #57646

Closed

  • Processing errors adds duplicate error.type diagnostic tags to kestrel.connection.duration in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel #57558
  • Perf improvement: json #57639
  • Perf regression: mvc #57640

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `ff233bd` to `0953a17` #57645
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `ff233bd` to `0953a17` #57644
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `ff233bd` to `0953a17` #57643
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix duplicate error.type on kestrel.connection.duration #57561
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add analyzer for custom IProblemDetailsWriter registration #49286
    area-mvc, analyzer, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • HybridCache: relocate to dotnet/extensions #57611
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/9.0] Fix duplicate error.type on kestrel.connection.duration #57581
    Servicing-consider, area-networking
  • #51611 - Extended Blazor server and webassembly options to match web format. #54649
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
